about_the_game:
Travel back in time to ancient China. Searching for secrets on the Silk Road.

          

In the game, players can freely explore the world and unlock the countries, cities and wnders of the Silk Road. Feel the changes in the landscape and weather. Players can become the "Marco Polo" of the East. Travel around the world and have cultural exchanges. Or you can be a warrior on the street. Execute the wicked for justice. Explore more hidden copies. Collect rare resources.

          

We added a real market trading system to the game. Each town had its own trading point. Players can collect and resell resources. Make more money. Players can also unlock workshops. Create more exclusive resources and open up new markets. Become the richest man on the Silk Road.

          

Enhance goodwill with female characters from different countries through interaction and gifts. Unlock their stories further. Gradually heat up the emotions. Finally a perfect love story.

          

Collecting wild resources. Hone your team skills. Make more delicious dishes from the Silk Road. Replenishing water, crossing the desert. Identify herbs to make medicines. You can make poison. Set traps to catch prey. Ensure health while improving combat effectiveness.

       

Millions of words of plot content. Explore clues in the game. Looking for the real ending. Saving innocent lives. Defeat the final BOSS.

short_description: The Tang Dynasty was just founded in China. The country is unstable. The emperor to solve the country's problems. Orders the protagonist to search for a mysterious treasure along the Silk Road. The protagonist meets a number of beautiful girls on the road and teams up with them.
